data.text:
What are the popular 5 star hotels in Durban?

Whether you are traveling to Durban for business or tourism, Suncoast Hotel & Towers , Beverly Hills and Endless Horizons Boutique Hotel are all preferred hotels.

How much is the average rate for 5 star hotels in Durban?

For 5 star hotels in Durban, the average price on weekdays is US$185, and the average price on weekends (Fridayâ€“Saturday) is US$235.

Which 5 star hotels in Durban provide swimming pools?

There are many 5 star hotels in Durban with swimming pools. Suncoast Hotel & Towers , Beverly Hills and Endless Horizons Boutique Hotel are very popular.

Which 5 star hotels in Durban provide fitness facilities?

Suncoast Hotel & Towers, Beverly Hills and Endless Horizons Boutique Hotel provide fitness facilities. Satisfy your fitness needs even while traveling!

Which 5 star hotels in Durban have bars?

For 5 star hotels in Durban with bars, Suncoast Hotel & Towers , Beverly Hills and Endless Horizons Boutique Hotel are very popular.

Which 5 star hotels in Durban provide breakfast?

Suncoast Hotel & Towers, Beverly Hills and Endless Horizons Boutique Hotel provide delicious breakfast. Start your day with high-quality breakfast!

Which 5 star hotels in Durban offer spa services?

Want to relax with spa treatment? Among 5 star hotels in Durban, Suncoast Hotel & Towers, Beverly Hills and Endless Horizons Boutique Hotel are very popular.

Which 5 star hotels in Durban provide airport transfer services?

Not familiar with Durban? Suncoast Hotel & Towers, Beverly Hills and Endless Horizons Boutique Hotel provide airport transfer services.

Which 5 star hotels in Durban provide free Wi-Fi?

Internet connection is an essential condition for travel. Suncoast Hotel & Towers and Beverly Hills are popular hotels with free Wi-Fi.
